attributes.action: Ask the Queen NOT to use her Emergency Powers and Dismiss the Government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is being said that this Government is corrupt and not fit to Govern Great Britain.  The Queen has the Right to dismiss a Government if she feels the need.  This petition is our chance to show how solid our support is of unelected Brown and his some would say Corrupt Government.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
